verbose_text: Interestingly, CD146 expression in culture was upregulated in normoxia and downregulated under hypoxic conditions, suggesting that CD146 expression by MSCs in vivo may be variable depending on vicinity to the vasculature and local oxygen levels XREF_BIBR, although other mechanisms such as calcium induced CD146 shedding on cells close to the bone surface may contribute XREF_BIBR.
